branchCategory.name: Valve (All Types)
branchCategory.description: SMC's VP300/500/700 series solenoid valve, offers high flow capacity and reduced power consumption (1.55W standard, 0.55W with power saving circuit).  The series may be used as either a selector valve, or a divider valve.  It is vacuum applicable up to –101.2kPa.  Series VP3145/3165/3185 is a large size, 3 port solenoid valve with a rubber seal.  It is possible to use the series in vacuum applications or under low pressure.  Both series are available in a normally closed or normally open styles.

branchItem.name: VP300/500/700, 3 Port Solenoid Valve, Body Ported, Single Unit
branchItem.description: SMC's VP300/500/700 series solenoid valve, offers high flow capacity and reduced power consumption (1.55W standard, 0.55W with power saving circuit).  The series may be used as either a selector valve, or a divider valve.  It is vacuum applicable up to –101.2kPa.  Series VP3145/3165/3185 is a large size, 3 port solenoid valve with a rubber seal.  It is possible to use the series in vacuum applications or under low pressure.  Both series are available in a normally closed or normally open styles.

branchItem.name: VP300/500 , 3 Port Solenoid Valve, Body Ported/Base Mounted, Low Wattage Specification
branchItem.description: SMC's VP300/500/700 series solenoid valve, offers high flow capacity and reduced power consumption (1.55W standard, 0.55W with power saving circuit).  The series may be used as either a selector valve, or a divider valve.  It is vacuum applicable up to –101.2kPa.  Series VP3145/3165/3185 is a large size, 3 port solenoid valve with a rubber seal.  It is possible to use the series in vacuum applications or under low pressure.  Both series are available in a normally closed or normally open styles.

branchItem.name: VP517/717, 3 Port Solenoid, Residual Pressure Relief, Modular Connection
branchItem.description: <p>VP5/717 series is a residual pressure relief 3 port valve with modular connection to SMC's AC series F.R.L unit.  It allows for space saving compared to non modular type.</p>
